alert.note: Alert for Foster; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 8:55AM CST until January 21 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow with light freezing rain and sleet. Total ice accumulations around a few hundredths of an inch. Additional snow accumulations of around one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Foster and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northwest winds look to develop later this morning through this afternoon. Some blowing of fresh snowfall is possible.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
